attributes.action: If a party seeking to be elected makes a promise, it should stand by it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A polictal party that makes a promise in its manifesto should by law be made to carry it out as this is part of why people have voted for them, The government made a promise of a vote on the EU consitution, only for the EU to rename it a treaty, but it is nearly the same as most European leaders have said,I believe the Queen should have a right to step in and order the people a vote on this matter

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
